text.text:
I had a wonderful 4-day stay at M Stay Hotel. The experience was excellent from start to finish. The front desk staff were very courteous, welcoming, and always ready to assist. The room service was prompt, efficient, and ensured a comfortable stay throughout. The rooms were well-maintained, clean, and cozy.

One of the highlights was the food, which was delicious and consistently of high quality. The variety and taste exceeded my expectations.

Overall, M Stay Hotel offers great hospitality, comfort, and service. I would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a pleasant and comfortable stay.

text.text:
Weston Hotel Review
Weston Hotel is a well-located venue with excellent ambience, good food, and reliable service. It offers ample parking, making it convenient for guests. Suitable for both large and small events, it’s an ideal choice for corporate functions as well as family gatherings. The in-house restaurant is decent, and the hotel’s prime location ensures easy access from the main road. I recently visited for a fashion week show and found it to be a well-managed and impressive venue overall.

I stayed for a week in the Belstead hotel. I thoroughly enjoyed my stay, the rooms and staff service were excellent and beyond expectations.
I’d like to specifically mention Mr Siraj, Mr Mario and Ms Kanchan in dining service, they were amazing. Everyday morning breakfast was prompt and they greeted us politely and served us with a smile.

text.text:
Our family’s week-long stay at The Belstead Hotel, Chennai was a beautiful reminder that true hospitality lies in the small, everyday gestures — the kind that turn an ‘ordinary’ hotel stay into an ‘extraordinary’ memory.

From the warm smiles at reception to the thoughtful touches in our rooms, every interaction felt genuine. The staff (Specially Ms. Rupa and receptionist Ms.Nisha also hotel restaurant manager was managing) went above and beyond without ever feeling intrusive, and their attention to detail made us feel cared for throughout.

The food was consistently fresh and flavorful, with options that pleased every member of our family. The location made exploring Chennai easy, yet the property itself felt like a peaceful escape from the city’s bustle.

It wasn’t just the amenities — it was the feeling of comfort, familiarity, and kindness that made all the difference. Thank you, The Belstead, for making our family holiday truly unforgettable in the most wonderfully ordinary way.”

text.text: The Belstead Hotel in Chennai provided a comfortable and supportive environment during a challenging time when my wife was receiving treatment at Apollo Hospital (March 9th-April 5th). Our cozy room and the consistently clean bathroom were much appreciated. The staff across the board, from the proactive housekeeping to the efficient restaurant and the helpful reception, were excellent. The delicious food was a bonus, and the active security provided peace of mind. We are greatful for the pleasant stay at the Belstead. We would recommend The Belstead for a comfortable and convenient stay.

Not only that I will prefer to choose this hotel for my future stays in Chennai, but I shall strongly recommend this hotel to those who look for a satisfying stay in a central location in Chennai.

text.text:
I recently stayed at Ginger Hotel Chennai with my family, and it was a delightful experience. The hotel offers excellent value for money, making it an ideal choice for budget-conscious travelers.

Accommodation:
The rooms are compact yet efficiently designed, providing all the necessary amenities for a comfortable stay. They were clean and well-maintained, ensuring a pleasant environment for relaxation.

Staff and Service:
The staff at Ginger Hotel were exceptionally courteous and always ready to assist, regardless of the time. Their dedication to guest satisfaction was evident throughout our stay. Notably, traveling with my young daughter, I appreciated their willingness to provide food whenever she felt hungry, showcasing their commitment to accommodating guests’ needs.

Dining:
The hotel’s dining options were commendable, offering a variety of dishes that catered to different palates. The food was delicious, and the service was prompt.

Overall Experience:
Our family stay at Ginger Hotel Chennai was comfortable and enjoyable. The combination of budget-friendly pricing, efficient room design, and outstanding service makes it a top recommendation for families visiting Chennai.

text.text:
Ibis is a venture of Novotel which provide executive stays special for business travels.

Likes -
Nice welcome by the team and receptionist Ambika handled our check-in with a warm welcome. Assisted with all details.
Ambiance of the hotel is very good, 10/10 for the cleanliness and aroma.
Neat and clean rooms with good amenities including mini fridge, hair dryer and basic necessities.
Whole staff team is very cooperative.
Nice breakfast buffet with good variety of both veg and non veg dishes with good taste.
Nice wifi speed and a good swimming pool to use.
They also have cricket nets, basketball court, volleyball, gum to spend good time to burn your calories.
Good security system which does not allow to get down at any other floors so no halts on random floors.
Overall a good experience to enjoy in the centre of the city.
Smooth check-out with warm greeting by Khushi.

Dislikes -
Rooms and bathrooms are bit small in size, but good to stay for a single person

text.text:
Business Stay Review: A Disappointing Experience

We booked a one-night business stay for two people with the expectation of a comfortable and professional environment. Unfortunately, our experience at this hotel fell far short of even the most basic standards.

The room itself was in unacceptable condition. Upon entry, we were overwhelmed by a strong, unpleasant odor that made it difficult to relax. The hygiene standards were clearly not up to mark, and the state of the room made it unsuitable for a restful night.

Most concerning was the bedbug infestation we discovered. Throughout the night, we experienced severe discomfort, and the presence of bedbugs made it nearly impossible to sleep. This is not just an inconvenience—it's a serious health and cleanliness issue that should never be overlooked in any accommodation, let alone one catering to business travelers.

We sincerely hope the management takes these matters seriously and implements immediate improvements in both staff training and room maintenance. This experience was not only disappointing but also disrupted what was meant to be a productive business trip.

text.text:
Do not stay here currently - there is very loud construction works going on. Their website discretely mentions this, though says the stop date is the 15th... It's the 17th, and the construction is ongoing. Came here with friends for a wedding.

We honestly would not have stayed here if we'd known it would be this ridiculously loud.

Every day, between 9am and 6pm. Even wearing noise cancelling headphones and with music on you can't get any rest.

They offered us the potential to move rooms, but on the day my partner was unwell and we were checking out the next day anyway. All our friends throughout the hotel had the same issue.

Not good enough for a 5 star hotel.

Other than this, the hotel is lovely. I imagine coming when there's not construction would be a great stay. The staff are wonderful.

text.text:
Taj used to be associated with luxury. Don't get me wrong, the service and the hospitality is still on point. The people are kind and helpful and get things done.

But wow the infrastructure and the hard product is so poor. The rooms are an afterthought. There's no harmony in the design. There's constant drilling sounds during the day. There's an ugly video door phone inside and very basic lighting controls which makes the whole place feel like a cheap budget hotel

Their Ginger hotels which are a budget hotel have some identity to their design. This is a mess.

Get back to the good days, Taj. Its not too late.

text.text:
Our stay at Taj Coromandel was nothing short of exceptional. From the moment we arrived, we were greeted with warm hospitality that instantly made us feel at home. The staff are highly experienced, attentive, and always ready to go the extra mile to ensure every guest’s comfort. Their professionalism is matched by a genuine warmth that truly sets this hotel apart.

The dining experience was equally remarkable. The breakfast spread offered an impressive variety of dishes, each prepared with exceptional taste and quality. Whether it was authentic local flavors or international favorites, every item was fresh, flavorful, and beautifully presented.

Taj Coromandel doesn’t just provide accommodation—it delivers a complete experience of luxury, comfort, and care. I would wholeheartedly recommend it to anyone looking for world-class service and unforgettable memories.

Stayed at the Turyaa Chennai for five days.

Overall a good hotel and recommended.

text.text:
I booked a banquet hall and a few rooms for the guests in this hotel.
Pros-
The banquet hall (thamarai) was beautiful. Perfect for 40-50 people.
The food was amazing. And the seating arrangements that they provided were also good.
The staff were kind and helpful. They did everything on time.
Cons-
I haven't seen a worse management than this! They kept creating issues and confusion till the day the function was over.. they created a lot of confusion at the last minute about whether we'll get rooms or not, despite booking several months in advance and getting a confirmation from them several times. We had to find rooms elsewhere for another day. And they created confusions with the bill even when our guests were checking out despite settling it in advance.
The rooms were okay - not good enough for the price they charge.
The lift was not working, we and our guests, especially older people faced inconvenience climbing 3 floors.

text.text:
Worst Hotel Experience Ever – Beware of Online Booking!

I booked this hotel well in advance through an online site, but when I reached at 10:30 PM after a long, exhausting journey, they casually said “no rooms, we already cancelled.” No phone call, no proper notice — just left me stranded late at night. This is fraudulent, irresponsible, and completely unprofessional. Staff showed zero empathy or accountability. They clearly overbook and push guests away without care. Beware of booking this place through online portals — they can ruin your trip in seconds!

M Stays in Chennai offers a blend of comfort and affordability, making it a notable choice for travelers. Situated within the M Wedding & Convention Centre, the hotel provides 34 spacious rooms equipped with modern amenities such as large-screen TVs, complimentary Wi-Fi, and plush king-sized beds. Guests can also enjoy a variety of Indian and international cuisines at the on-site M Kitchen restaurant.

The hotel's location is advantageous, being in close proximity to Apollo Hospital and the Ambattur Industrial Estate, with convenient access to Chennai Airport (17 km), Chennai Central Railway Station (15 km), and the CMBT Bus Terminal (8 km).

text.text:
Five-stars for meeting all of my expectations.

The hotel is great, it hits the essentials: Clean bed, clean bathroom, bottled water, toiletries, hot water, AC and attentive staff. Plenty of notable eateries are available with in a walkable distance.

The  24-hour check-in policy worked perfectly for my purposes: A place to stay for 24 hours near Chennai Central with 24hours accessibility.

Their pricing is transparent & budget friendly: The full tariff was posted at the check-in desk. The receptionists and the other staffs are having very hospitable behavior and active in service.

S R  is exactly beside main road and just opposite to the metro station which is an added advantage.

Whether for business or leisure, this hotel exceeded my expectations in every way. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a comfortable and memorable stay in Chennai!

text.text:
The Westin Hotel Chennai, located in the heart of the bustling city, is a luxurious retreat that offers a haven of tranquility amidst the chaos. With its elegant architecture, impeccable service, and top-notch amenities, the hotel provides guests with an exquisite experience.

Upon entering the hotel, guests are greeted with warm smiles and a grand lobby that exudes elegance. The spacious and tastefully decorated rooms offer a perfect blend of comfort and style, providing a cozy and soothing environment for relaxation. The plush beds, luxurious linens, and well-appointed bathrooms ensure a comfortable stay.

The Westin Hotel Chennai boasts a wide range of dining options that cater to various tastes. From authentic Indian cuisine to international flavors, the hotel's restaurants offer a delightful culinary journey. The signature restaurant, Seasonal Tastes, presents an array of delectable dishes, while Kangan offers a fine dining experience with its meticulously crafted Indian delicacies. The stylish and sophisticated bar, Willows, serves a range of premium spirits and innovative cocktails, making it a perfect spot to unwind and socialize.

The hotel also offers an array of amenities to enhance the stay of its guests. The WestinWORKOUT Fitness Studio is equipped with state-of-the-art equipment, allowing guests to maintain their fitness routines while traveling. The Heavenly Spa by Westin provides a serene and rejuvenating experience with its range of wellness treatments. The outdoor pool offers a refreshing escape, where guests can relax and soak up the sun.

One of the standout features of The Westin Hotel Chennai is its exceptional service. The staff is known for their attentiveness and willingness to go above and beyond to ensure guest satisfaction. From the moment of arrival until departure, every interaction with the hotel's staff is marked by professionalism and a genuine desire to create a memorable experience.

The hotel's location is also a noteworthy advantage. Situated in Velachery, it provides easy access to various shopping centers, entertainment venues, and business districts, making it an ideal choice for both leisure and business travelers.

In conclusion, The Westin Hotel Chennai offers a luxurious and pampering experience to its guests. From its stylish rooms and delectable dining options to its top-notch amenities and outstanding service, every aspect of the hotel is designed to create a memorable stay. Whether visiting for business or pleasure, The Westin Hotel Chennai is a destination that promises a combination of comfort, convenience, and indulgence.

text.text:
One of the best places to stay at in Chennai, especially if you’re a foodie who is into Japanese and pan Asian food, this place is surrounded by a bunch of great Japanese restaurants.

The hotel itself is great, really warm and helpful staff, checking in and out was a breeze, I had an issues with my work schedule getting postponed to a week later but the hotel was kind enough to let me carry forward my booking for the next week.
Rooms are really well kept and worth every penny you’re paying for them. The entire hotel is non smoking so please be respectful of that, not sure if they have a dedicated smoking area within the hotel.

The restaurant’s room service is super quick they made my day by not having me wait a long while to get some fuel in after a long stressful drive to the city and the prices are reasonable, won’t burn a hole in your pocket if you’re eating at the hotel for most of your meals.

The hotel has valet parking, can also ask to have your car washed if you want to, that’s something they offer, unsure about the prices.

They’re also at the heart of the city, most places both tourist attractions and commercial spaces are close by which makes life easier by cutting down the amount of time and money spent on travelling around.

Definitely recommending this to friends and acquaintances for their visits to the city.

I recently stayed at the Ibis Hotel and had a truly pleasant experience. From the moment I checked in, the staff were welcoming, professional, and efficient. The room was spotless, well-designed, and surprisingly spacious for a budget-friendly hotel. The bed was incredibly comfortable, ensuring a great night's sleep.

What I really appreciated was the attention to detail—everything from the fast Wi-Fi and functional work desk to the clean, modern bathroom made my stay hassle-free. The breakfast buffet was also a highlight, offering a good variety of fresh and tasty options to start the day right.

The receptionist Sheeban & Aakash followed up later to ensure everything in the room was satisfactory, showing real concern for our comfort

text.text:
My recent stay at the hotel was a delightful experience, characterized by excellent service and comfort. From the moment I arrived, I was greeted by Adil at the front desk, whose helpfulness and cooperation set a positive tone for my stay. Adil went above and beyond to ensure that my check-in process was smooth and that all my queries were promptly addressed, making me feel valued as a guest.

The room I stayed in, while small, was exceptionally clean and comfortable. It provided a cozy retreat after a long day, allowing me to relax and unwind. The attention to cleanliness is commendable, as it greatly enhances the overall guest experience.

While my accommodation was enjoyable, I did notice that the restaurant offered a limited variety of food options. Although the quality of the meals was satisfactory, a broader selection would have elevated the dining experience further.

On a positive note, all the amenities were readily available and well maintained, contributing to a convenient and enjoyable stay.

Overall, I would rate my experience as excellent service. The combination of a helpful front desk, a comfortable room, and accessible amenities made my stay memorable. I look forward to returning in the future and hope to see improvements in the restaurant offerings.

text.text:
I recently had the pleasure of staying at the Grand Elegant Hotel in Chennai, and the experience was nothing short of enchanting. The impeccable service and warm hospitality extended by the staff, particularly Mr. Surya Rana and Mr. Biswanath, made my visit truly unforgettable.

From the moment I stepped into the opulent lobby, I was greeted by a sense of sophistication and charm that set the tone for a remarkable stay. Mr. Surya Rana, with his affable demeanor and genuine smile, made the check-in process seamless and delightful. His attention to detail and efficiency were evident, ensuring that I felt welcomed and valued as a guest.

Throughout my stay, Mr. Biswanath's dedication to ensuring guest satisfaction was truly commendable. He went above and beyond to make certain that every aspect of my accommodation was perfect. Whether it was arranging for additional amenities or providing insightful recommendations about the local attractions, Mr. Biswanath's passion for his role was evident in every interaction.

The rooms at Grand Elegant exuded comfort and elegance, offering a retreat after a day of exploring Chennai. The meticulous housekeeping, overseen by Mr. Surya Rana, maintained an atmosphere of pristine luxury. The attention to cleanliness and order was evident, creating a haven where I could relax and unwind.

One of the highlights of my stay was the exquisite dining experience at the hotel's restaurant, and here, too, Mr. Biswanath's guidance proved invaluable. His knowledge of the menu, coupled with a genuine enthusiasm for the culinary offerings, enhanced my dining pleasure. The culinary team's dedication to delivering a gastronomic delight was apparent in every dish.

It's the thoughtful gestures that set Grand Elegant apart, and I must express my gratitude to Mr. Surya Rana and Mr. Biswanath for their extraordinary efforts. Their commitment to ensuring the well-being and satisfaction of guests reflects the true spirit of hospitality.

In conclusion, my stay at the Grand Elegant Hotel was a harmonious blend of luxury, warmth, and impeccable service. Mr. Surya Rana and Mr. Biswanath's contributions were instrumental in making this experience exceptional, and I extend my heartfelt appreciation to them. Grand Elegant Hotel, under their capable guidance, has become a beacon of hospitality in Chennai, and I look forward to returning to relish their exemplary service

text.text:
I had the pleasure of staying at the Taj Hotel a few months ago during my visit from Punjab, and I must say it was an unforgettable experience. The highlight of our stay was undoubtedly the exquisite food offered at the hotel. Every meal was a culinary delight, with a diverse range of dishes that catered to various tastes. From traditional Punjabi cuisine to international delicacies, the hotel's restaurant truly exceeded our expectations.

What made our stay even more enjoyable was the exceptional service provided by the hotel staff, particularly Jasmine. She went above and beyond to ensure that we had a comfortable and memorable stay. Her warm hospitality and willingness to assist with any request truly stood out. Jasmine's attention to detail and dedication to making our stay special left a lasting impression on us.

The hotel itself was a haven of luxury and elegance, with well-appointed rooms, stunning decor, and impeccable cleanliness. The attention to detail in every aspect of the hotel's design and maintenance was evident throughout our stay.

In summary, our experience at the Taj Hotel was nothing short of extraordinary. The combination of outstanding food, a luxurious environment, and the exceptional service of staff like Jasmine made our stay truly remarkable. I highly recommend this hotel to anyone visiting the area, and I look forward to returning in the future.

Review from my Dad (Yadwinder Singh)

Our family recently spent a week at Taj Coromandel, Chennai, and it was an unforgettable experience from start to finish. From the moment we arrived, we were warmly welcomed by the front desk staff, who made the check-in process seamless and efficient. The concierge team was incredibly knowledgeable, ensuring we had the best experiences during our stay.

What truly set this hotel apart was the exceptional hospitality from every staff member we encountered. Their attentiveness, warmth, and professionalism made us feel genuinely valued as guests. We highly recommend Taj Coromandel for anyone seeking a luxurious and memorable stay. We will definitely be returning for another incredible experience!

text.text:
Hotel Review: Turyaa Chennai

First Impressions and Check-In:
Upon arrival at Turyaa Chennai, the initial experience was underwhelming. There was no warm welcome from the staff and the lack of smiles and general enthusiasm was noticeable. The customer service was disappointing, particularly with Raj, the receptionist, who demonstrated a clear need for hospitality training. His interaction skills were lacking, making the check-in process less than pleasant.
Appreciate the effort from Jayshree to make us feel good.

Accommodation:
Despite the poor start, the hotel manager stepped in and was helpful in upgrading us to a room with a single mattress, which was perfect for our family as it allowed our child to sleep comfortably in the middle. The room itself was beautifully decorated, clean and elegant, reflecting the hotel's aesthetic standards.

Location:
The hotel is situated in the heart of the city, making it a convenient location for accessing various attractions and amenities in Chennai.

Amenities and Services:
The overall cleanliness and elegance of the hotel are commendable. However, there are significant areas for improvement in terms of service:
- Dental Kits and Access Cards: Our family room was provided with only one dental kit and one access card. While we could request additional items, it would be more customer-friendly to provide these essentials upfront, especially in a hotel of this size.
- Housekeeping: We experienced a delay in the cleaning of used utensils, which remained unattended for an entire day.
- Swimming Area: There were no towels available at the swimming pool initially. Although a staff member assured us that towels would be provided, it would be more efficient to have a few towels readily available for guests.

Dining:
The food at the hotel was excellent, contributing positively to our stay.

Conclusion:
Turyaa Chennai has the potential to be a top-tier hotel given its beautiful decor, cleanliness and prime location. However, the staff's lack of hospitality skills significantly detracts from the overall experience. A focus on improving staff training and customer service can greatly enhance the hotel's reputation and popularity in Chennai. With these adjustments, Turyaa Chennai can provide a truly welcoming and comfortable stay for its guests.

highlightedText.text: "The hotel offers cleanliness everywhere - lobby, rooms, elevators, rooftop."

text.text: Stayed for two weeks here on a business trip. Chose this hotel on basis of reviews and also it was just 500m from my office. Great rooms with great view (choose higher floors for views). The hotel is located in a prime location on Rajiv Gandhi Salai which is a main highway in Chennai. Moderately near to the airport. Hotel has a great view in the lobby, a huge piano at the entrance. Even the elevators pose a great view while going up or down. The buffet breakfast/dinner variety was decent. The highlight of the hotel is its rooftop. It offers a beautiful view of the city with moderately strong winds (hold on to your hats!). It also has an infinity pool and gym on rooftop which again offers great view. Service of the staff is decent as well. The hotel offers cleanliness everywhere - lobby, rooms, elevators, rooftop. Didn't find any major point to complain about. Would recommend to anyone visiting this part of the city, and I would choose the same on my next visit as well. Good work team Turyaa. 👏

text.text:
For personal reasons we had to find a hygienic hotel to stay near central railway station during the mid of august 2021. When we searched for such a hotel online we got fab metro manor hotel, Chennai as the result. It showed it as a good looking hotel with super clean rooms in aesthetic atmosphere. So we booked a room for our family with 3 persons. When we reached the hotel at 8.30 am and entered the hotel lobby, we were shocked to see the most unclean place. We were made to sit for half an hour till the day duty receptionist arrived to relieve the night duty person. No staff was wearing mask including the receptionist. No one followed any covid protocol. The room was called deluxe room which was very dirty all around. The matresses and blankets were not clean. The room and washroom were very dirty. As it had only 2 beds an additional matress was given for us which was too shabby. A torn, tidy rag was put as door mat. They provided complimentary breakfast where we found the serving people without face mask
and gloves. Never ever book this hotel any more.
